document_data.name: Kysaer Whitemantle
document_data.mainbody: '''Kysaer Whitemantle''', also known as the '''Rider in White''', was the most famous [[assassin]] in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] and secretly a member of the [[Night Masks]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Kysaer was known to use ''[[Elquillar]]'', the famed "Sword of Many Faces".
document_data.History: As an independent agent, Kysaer was hired by most of the governments of the [[Inner Sea]], usually to kill evil people. This he kept his association with the Night Masks a very closely guarded secret. Despite this, he managed to develop a network of local contacts. Kysaer had an technical approach to killing, instead of a brutal one.
